entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending after midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
